question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. a. Christian Democratic Union (CDU)
raw_output:
I have a somewhat favorable opinion of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) because they are a major political party that has historically played a significant role in shaping Germany's policies and governance. Their moderate stance and emphasis on economic stability appeal to me, although I also recognize some criticisms regarding their approach to social issues. Overall, I see them positively but with some reservations.

ANSWER: B
